name: GIGA WRECKER
description: Become more than human and save mankind from total annihilation! From legendary developer Game Freak comes an action adventure like no other - manipulate the world around you and smash the evil Ajeet to smithereens!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64-bit Win 7 or above Processor: Core 2 Duo ~2GHz or higher (or equivalent) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics Card NVIDIA GTS 240 or higher (or equivalent) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
